meanings.definition: A type of explosive used in mining.
meanings.sent1: The miners carefully handled the dunnite to blast through the rock.
meanings.sent2: The dunnite exploded with a loud bang, clearing the path for the miners.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the dunnite for a nut and ran off with it!
meanings.sent4: The dunnite was a silent threat, waiting to unleash its power on the mountain.
meanings.sent5: The dunnite shimmered in the light, promising destruction to the stubborn rock.

meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of ammonium nitrate and aluminum.
meanings.sent1: The geologist identified the dunnite in the rock sample under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The shiny dunnite mineral sparkled in the sunlight, catching the eye of the hiker.
meanings.sent3: The dunnite mineral was so rare that it became the talk of the town!
meanings.sent4: The dunnite seemed to hold the secrets of the earth within its crystalline structure.
meanings.sent5: The dunnite mineral gleamed like a hidden treasure, waiting to be discovered.
